sentences.sContent: I recommend either whey or soy protein shakes.
sentences.sContent_eng: I recommend either whey or soy protein shakes.
sentences.sCn: 我推荐乳清或者大豆蛋白奶昔。

sentences.sContent: If you like, you can serve the dish plain, without the soy or oyster sauce.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you like, you can serve the dish plain, without the soy or oyster sauce.
sentences.sCn: 如果你喜欢的话，你可以把这道做得简单点，没有加酱油或蚝油。

sentences.sContent: Soy products like tofu, tempeh and fortified soymilk do double duty in this regard since they provide both calcium and protein.
sentences.sContent_eng: Soy products like tofu, tempeh and fortified soymilk do double duty in this regard since they provide both calcium and protein.
sentences.sCn: 大豆食品像豆腐、豆豉和强化豆奶在这方面有双重功能，因为它们可同时提供钙和蛋白。

phrases.pCn: 大豆浓缩蛋白；[医]浓缩大豆蛋白
